title: CapCut creative suite for video editing, graphic design, and more
introduction: CapCut is an online creative suite designed for everyone to create stunning videos. It offers a complete package that includes graphic design, team collaboration, and advanced AI technology to enhance the creative journey.
features: Rich library of royalty-free music and sound effects
Edit with unlimited video, audio, image, and text tracks
Crop, trim, split, and resize videos without compromising quality
Huge selection of stock footage and templates for videos, images, and graphics
Team management with different roles and access
targetPeople: Content creators, social media managers, fitness trainers, small business owners, event organizers, travel enthusiasts

faqs.question: What is CapCut?
faqs.answer: CapCut is an online creative suite designed for creating stunning videos, including features for graphic design, team collaboration, and advanced AI technology.

faqs.question: What features does CapCut offer?
faqs.answer: CapCut offers an online video editor, online image editor, royalty-free music and sound effects, unlimited video/audio/image/text tracks, crop/trim/split/resize tools, stock footage and templates, AI technology, creative cloud, team collaboration, team management, cloud backup, file management, and video sharing options.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, CapCut offers a free trial.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from using CapCut?
faqs.answer: Content creators, social media managers, fitness trainers, small business owners, event organizers, and travel enthusiasts can benefit from using CapCut.

faqs.question: What is the pricing strategy for CapCut?
faqs.answer: CapCut uses a subscription-based pricing strategy.
